solution_method.step2: Found hidden patterns in color values

lessons: Hints are crucial but not always obvious
Color/pixel data matters, not just shapes

Level 1.key_insight: Visual elements directly map to values

visual_encoding.description: Uses visual elements (shapes, colors, sizes) to encode data

mathematical_operations.description: Requires mathematical transformations (not just direct reading)

multi_stage.description: Solutions often require multiple steps in sequence

hints_matter.description: Textual hints are critical and must be interpreted carefully

creative_interpretation.description: Standard approaches may not work - creative thinking required

examples: Generate key → Check address → Success or fail

new_theories.name: Color-Based Encoding
new_theories.reasoning: Level 4 used color channels. Maybe Level 5 image has hidden data in color channels?
new_theories.test: Check if crypto5fix.png has color information we missed

new_theories.name: Sequence Generation
new_theories.reasoning: Levels 2-3 used mathematical sequences. Maybe areas generate a sequence?
new_theories.test: Look for Fibonacci, primes, powers of 2 in area patterns

new_theories.name: Multi-Step Mini-Puzzle
new_theories.reasoning: Previous puzzles had multi-stage solutions. Mini-puzzle might define stages.
new_theories.test: Apply operations in sequence: -1, then ×, then %, then ÷

new_theories.name: Numbers as Stage Indicators
new_theories.reasoning: 09111819 and 11122111 might indicate which operation to use when
new_theories.test: Use numbers as operation selectors for each rectangle

new_theories.name: Grid Transformation
new_theories.reasoning: LXIV (64) and 8×8 structure suggests grid operations

new_theories.name: FIX as Instruction
new_theories.reasoning: The word "FIX" in mini-puzzle might be a directive
new_theories.test: FIX could mean: Fixed-point math, Fix/correct something, F=15 I=9 X=24 in hex

new_theories.name: Cross-Rectangle Operations
new_theories.test: Operations between non-adjacent rectangles based on hint numbers
